name: Egawa Suguru's Super League CD
overview: Egawa Suguru no Super League CD is the fourth and final entry in Sega's 16-bit Super League baseball franchise, featuring the endorsement of baseball commentator Suguru Egawa, star pitcher for the Yomiuri Giants from 1979 until 1987. As usual, the game features an NPB license and includes all 12 Pacific and Central League teams with full 1993 rosters, along with All-Star teams for each league. Gameplay is largely unchanged from previous installments, utilizing the standard catcher's view for both batting and pitching. The game includes the usual Pennant Race and Exhibition match modes. New in this version are the additions of a Home Run Contest mode and a team database.
